summary: British archaeologists and their American investor ship an Egyptian mummy's sarcophagus to London but someone has the amulet to revive the mummy that will then kill all those who disturbed its tomb.
cast: Terence Morgan|Ronald Howard|Fred Clark|Jeanne Roland|George Pastell|Jack Gwillim|John Paul|Dickie Owen|Jill Mai Meredith|Michael Ripper|Harold Goodwin|Jimmy Gardner|Vernon Smythe|Marianne Stone|Ray Austin|Maxwell Craig|Olga Dickie|Charles Gilliard|Nora Gordon|Pat Gorman|George Hilsdon|George Leech|Colin McKenzie|Michael McStay|Eddie Powell|Bernard Rebel|Roy Stewart|John Tatham|Larry Taylor
